pdf.head:
<#assign logoInfo>https://5554661-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=9544&c=5554661_SB1&h=3c1a74753ea9e8671a1c</#assign>
  	<#assign regInfo>Company Registration No: 07479524.  Registered Office: 3 Finsbury Avenue, 5th Floor, London, EC2M 2PA, United Kingdom.</#assign>
	<#assign emailInfo>creditcontrol@onfido.com</#assign>
	<#assign telInfo>02081333628</#assign>
	<#assign vatInfo>GB 159 2397 76</#assign>
  
    
        
			
    			

					TAX INVOICE
					 
                  	
    			
          	
          
			
        		

        			${record.billaddress}

VAT Number: ${record.vatregnum}
        			 
        			 
        			Invoice Date
        			${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}

VAT No: ${vatInfo}
        		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			${record.trandate?string.long}
        		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			 
        		        		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			Invoice Number
        		        		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			${record.tranid}
        		        		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			 
        		
              	

        			 
        			 
        			Reference
        		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			 
        			${record.otherrefnum}
        			 
        		
              	

        			 
        			 
        			 
        			 
        			 
        		       		
        		

        			 
        			 
        			 
        			Period
        			 
        		
              	

        			 
        			 
        			 
        			${record.postingperiod}
        			 
        		
          	
        

        

			
          		

                  	${regInfo}
					Page  of
pdf.body:
<#if record.item?has_content>
  
      <#list record.item as item>
          <#if item_index==0>
              
                  

                      Description
                      Quantity
                      Unit Price
                      Tax Rate
                      Amount
                  
              
          </#if>
          

              ${item.description}
              ${item.quantity}
              ${item.rate}
              ${item.taxrate}
              ${item.amount}
          
      </#list>
  
</#if>



	

       
      ${record.subtotal@label}
      ${record.subtotal}
      
      

       
      ${record.taxtotal@label}
      ${record.taxtotal}
      
      

       
      ${record.total@label}
      ${record.total}
	



	

      Due Date: ${record.duedate?string.long}
    
  	

      Bank: ${record.custbody_bbs_bank_name}
    
    

      Sort Code: ${record.custbody_bbs_bank_sort_code}
    
    

      Account Number: ${record.custbody_bbs_bank_account_number}
    
    

      IBAN: ${record.custbody_bbs_bank_iban}
    
    

      SWIFT: ${record.custbody_bbs_bank_bic}
